    • Method Detail

      • readXMLResponse

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder readXMLResponse(java.net.HttpURLConnection con)
        Generic Method
        Read the XML using Bufferedreader. BufferedReader simplifies reading text from a character input stream.
        The BufferReader insert the whole content of the connection inside a string of type StringBuilder.
        The reading process stops at the end of the file.

        Note: The connection HTTP in the parameter is already open.

        Parameters:
        con - Connection HTTP from which the stream is read.
        Returns:
        string value of what the contains the Http connection.

      • getXMLDocument

        public static java.lang.String getXMLDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Generic Method
        Turn a document into a String. The document represents the XML file which is sent to ACTICO server.
        The string is used by the outStreamWriter (from method sendXMLRequest) to send out the information to ACTICO server

        DOMImplementationLS is an extended DOMImplementation interface that provides the factory methods for creating the objects required for loading and saving.

        LSSerializer is provides an API for serializing (writing) a DOM document out into XML.
        The XML data is written to a string or an output stream.

        Method modifyXMLRequest precedes this method.
        ethod sendXMLRequest follows this method.

        Parameters:
        document -
        Returns:
        String with the content of an XML file

      • buildDocumentFromString

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document buildDocumentFromString(java.io.StringWriter stringWriter)
        Generic Method
        Parse document with respect to XML nodes. This method is nested in modifyXMLRequest.

        DocumentBuilderFactory defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain a parser that produces DOM object trees from XML documents.

        Parameters:
        stringWriter - string with the content of the XML
        Returns:
        document using document builder

      • modifyXMLRequest

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document modifyXMLRequest(java.io.StringWriter stringWriter,
                                                    Input input)
        Specific Method
        Set the XML nodes following the structure object Output.
        • Use the method buildDocumentFromString to create a document from stringWriter.
        • Point the XML nodes of the XML Request
        • Set the values inside XML nodes of XML Request

        Method buildXMLInstance precedes this method.
        Method getXMLDocument follows this method.

        Parameters:
        stringWriter - XML file of type String
        input - object model used to set the attributes value of XML file
        Returns:
        document with XML attributes values corresponding to the request

      • castXMLintoOutput

        public static Output castXMLintoOutput(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder,
                                       java.lang.String nodeName)
        Specific Method
        Take out attributes values of XML node.
        • Declare and initialize an instance of type Output
        • Assign the outcoming of buildDocumentFromBuffer to Document
        • Retrieve the node attributes from the Document
        • Set the Output attributes with the nodes attributes

        Method readXMLResponse is preceding this method.
        This method is the last method of ActicoInterface#getResponse.
        Method buildDocumentFromBuffer is nested in this method.

        Parameters:
        stringBuilder - string corresponding to the XML file.
        nodeName -
        Returns:
        output object with the XML attributes values in the object fields.

      • buildDocumentFromBuffer

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document buildDocumentFromBuffer(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Generic Method
        Parse document with respect to XML nodes.
        • Declare and initialize a Document
        • Parse and insert String in the Document using DocumentBuilder from DocumentBuilderFactory

        This method is nested inside castXMLintoOutput.

        Parameters:
        stringBuilder - string with the content of the XML.
        Returns:
        document using DocumentBuilder from DocumentBuilderFactory.

      • sendXMLRequest

        public static void sendXMLRequest(java.net.HttpURLConnection con,
                                  java.lang.String XMLRequest)
        Specific Method
        Send a XML file on a connection HTTP.
        • Create an output stream on the connection and open an OutputStreamWriter on it.
        • Write a string to the stream
        • Get Response Code - here 201 if HTTP POST is successful
        access the response productCategory

        Method getXMLDocument precedes this method.
        Method readXMLResponse(HttpURLConnection) readXMLResponse} follows this method.

        Note: The HTTP Connection is already open.

        Parameters:
        con - Http Connection
        XMLRequest - XML file with the request of type String.

      • buildXMLInstance

        public static java.io.StringWriter buildXMLInstance(org.apache.xerces.xs.XSModel xsModel,
                                                    java.lang.String targetNamespace,
                                                    java.lang.String nodeName)
                                             throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        Generic Method
        Get an XML Document. The root element depends on the two parameters, the target namespace and the domicile of the node.
        • Declare and instanciate an XSInstance
        • Set the parameters of the XSInstance instance
        • Declare and instanciate a String of type StringWriter
        • Declare and assign a XML Document
        • Generate an XML instance with default values in the attributes
        • Funnel XML in String of type stringWriter

        Method loadXSDDocument preceded this method.
        Method modifyXMLRequest following this method.

        Parameters:
        xsModel - structure of the XML (XML Schema Definition)
        targetNamespace - XML Namespace is a mechanism to avoid domicile conflicts by differentiating elements or attributes within an XML document that may have identical names, but different definitions.
        nodeName - domicile of the node from which the information is taken in the method.
        Returns:
        return a string which represents the XML Document
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException - if a fatal error of configuration appears
